name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Levels confirmed on site
Acceptance Criteria - Set out in accordance with design drawings or site conditions
Verifying Document - Visual Inspection / On Site Verification
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Structural Reinforcement as per Structural Design documentation / additional SDA
Acceptance Criteria - Shotcrete Reinforcement mesh is held firm so cannot vibrate. Steel bar installed as required, with starter bars if needed.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Formworks to comply with the final shape/size of the wall
Acceptance Criteria - Formworks match designs and will enable concrete finishes as desired
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Finish surface of wall
Acceptance Criteria - Off Gun / Screed finish as required
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Inspection of reo and formworks
Acceptance Criteria - Steel reinforcement in accordance with design documentation
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Concrete is poured to required levels and strength
Acceptance Criteria - Strength and finish requirement met. Finished level within tolerances.
Verifying Document - Visual inspection Strength Test
